name: quicken-category-tag-cleanup
description: Exported "All Transacitons" from all time from 11 years of using Quicken.  Then imported it into MySQL and counted the number of transactions in each category and in each tag.  I need to use this script to determine which categories are redundant.  I've determined that I've been misusing the category/tagging system all along and that I need to use the category structure more like a folder system, and tag the names of members of my family for which transactions belong to them, for purposes of expense tracking on a per-family-member, per-categoy basis; and for budgeting later on.  Some tags may be in non-existant categories, or vise versa, and I'm going to try and use this script to determine how to recategorize the transactions.
author: Andrew J. Leer <leeand00@hotmail.com>
